No blurring

width, height = 280, 175

distance = 48...
xShift, yShift = 0., 0.

mTarget: 0.32x
mRecovery: 0.32x

for i in range(NofP):
    mRes[i,:] = cp.asarray([3*(4*listY[i]-mPixelY*2+18)/mPixelY,
			4*(-3*listX[i]+mPixelX*1.5+6)/mPixelX,
			300*((listX[i]-mPixelX/2-3)**2+(listY[i]-mPixelY/2+5)**2-20)/mPixelX/mPixelY])
bExp = cp.tensordot(matrixA,mRes,axes=([2,4],[0,1]))

repeat:
	5000	4	3
	5000	0	0
	5000	2	2
	5000	0	0
